intro.title: Profile
paragraphs: I am a backend engineer currently working and living in Beijing, China.
With 11 years of internet-industry development experience, I have a solid software engineering foundation, value code quality and architecture, and possess full-stack capabilities.

At work, I take ownership, collaborate efficiently, and prioritize knowledge sharing and cross-team communication. I identify business bottlenecks and optimize processes with a product mindset. I maintain strong interest in internet technologies, Web3, and AI, and continually learn best practices from open-source projects.
Outside of work, I enjoy walking with my family, listening to music, and occasionally drawing.

items.title: Content Moderation LLM Fine-tuning
items.description: As project lead, drove fine-tuning of a moderation LLM to improve precision and recall in a vertical domain. Analyzed human review standards and refined the risk taxonomy; improved prompt quality with RAG and few-shot. Built an annotation platform using LLM pre-labeling and AI-assisted tooling, boosting labeling efficiency by 40%. Risk detection precision rose from 60% to 80%, and recall from 20% to 70%.

items.title: Content Moderation Efficiency
items.description: Led the design of machine moderation strategies to reduce human review costs while maintaining safety and quality. Instrumented and analyzed the review pipeline, delivered 30+ automated rules covering 6+ business types. Built an LLM moderation platform supporting multi-agent configurations, model switching, and prompt tuning, covering ~100 review criteria. Human review cost dropped by 83%, backlog rate from 20% to 0, and review time by 40%.

items.title: LLM-Driven Data Analysis Agent
items.description: Built a data analysis agent that answers natural-language queries, generates SQL, executes queries, and renders multiple visualizations. Implemented a LangChain ReAct agent, auto-injecting visible schema into prompts and using RAG for domain knowledge. Added long-term and short-term memory for multi-turn conversations. Replaced part of routine analysis work, improving product and operations efficiency by 30%, and filed a national patent.

items.title: Flowlet - Visual Workflow Orchestration
items.description: A lightweight drag-and-drop workflow system for building and running data pipelines with LLM and API nodes.

items.title: Crowdfunding - Tiered & Custom Funding
items.description: A flexible crowdfunding system with multi-tier and custom contributions, campaign management, and failure refunds. Supports tiered/custom donations, failed refund flows, and successful withdrawals; uses a state machine plus CEI and Pausable/Ownable to control fund risk.

items.title: Gogoga Token - ERC20 with Token Sale
items.description: An ERC20 token with built-in sale functionality, pausable transfers, minting, and configurable purchase limits. ERC20 extensions support sale, minting, and purchase caps; airdrops use Merkle Tree whitelist verification.

items.title: Gogoga NFT - ERC721 with Royalties
items.description: An ERC721 NFT collection with EIP-2981 royalties, pausable minting, batch operations, and burnable tokens.

items.title: Voting System - On-chain Decentralized Voting
items.description: A decentralized voting system with candidate/voter registration, time-boxed voting, pause controls, and transparent tallying.

items.title: Technical Expert
items.description: Led enterprise-scale web application development and mentored junior engineers.
